description: WisdomPlan is an AI-powered, community-driven learning platform that guides adult learners to skill mastery and career growth with personalized learning pathways and robust learning support.
title: WisdomPlan: Your AI-Powered Learning Companion
introduction: WisdomPlan is an AI-powered platform designed to create tailored learning plans quickly and efficiently. It helps users plan, schedule, and sequence their learning tasks, centralize resources, and adapt tasks as they progress.
features: Centralize courses, docs, and webpages in one plan
Adapt your learning tasks as you go
Take notes when learning in one convenient place
Calendar and email reminders for consistent learning
Analytics dashboard to help you track progress
Sharing your plans with classmates and friends
Access to 100+ learning plans from the community
targetPeople: Learners seeking efficient and personalized learning plans
